tool_description: Fast Reading (Bionic Reading) - is a shallow method of reading facilitating the reading process by guiding the eyes through text with artificial fixation points. As a result, the reader is only focusing on the highlighted initial letters and lets the brain center complete the word.
name: Fast Reading
title: Fast Reading

api_list.name: go
api_list.description: Convert raw text to Bionized Reading.

required_parameters.name: txt
required_parameters.default: Fast Reading - is a shallow method of reading facilitating the reading process by guiding the eyes through text with artificial fixation points. As a result, the reader is only focusing on the highlighted initial letters and lets the brain center complete the word.
